name: Artemia
title: Empress of Light

uniqueWeapon.name: Brilliant Praise, Brauxio
effect: Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 200% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 20%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 240% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 24%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 290% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 29%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 350% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 35%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 420% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 42%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.
Every 15 sec, creates a Shield for 10 sec that blocks DMG proportional to 500% of own ATK, and ATK is increased by 50%. While the Shield is in effect, gains immunity to CC.

soulWeapon.advancement0: Summons the soul of Brilliant Praise, Brauxio for 8 sec, increasing all allies' ATK by 40% and DEF by 40%.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Reduces DMG all allies take from enemies by 30% for the duration of the Skill.
soulWeapon.advancement2: Dispels negative effects from all allies and dispels positive effects from all enemies every 1 sec for the duration of the Skill.
soulWeapon.activation: Charges up upon dealing DMG 150 times.

Blessing of Light can be stacked up to 10 times max. Per every stack, ATK is increased by ??? , DMG dealt to enemies other than heroes is increased by 7% and DMG received from enemies other than heroes is reduced by 3%.

dark: When HP falls below 50%, gain 2 sec of immunity to all DMG. This effect activates only once every 30 sec.

profile.likes: Sweet cakes, the eyes of righteous knights

background.story: Penteonia is an impenetrable kingdom. Even the Demon Army could not breach its defense 100 years ago. Ruling over this iron kingdom is Artemia, the Empress of Light. Ever since childhood, she has lived under the weight of responsibility of the throne she would eventually inherit. When she finally realized that the victory of her kingdom was only made possible by the sacrifices of her people, she swore to never hide from her duties. She would face the pressure of royal responsibility with courage. Penteonia has historically been a selfish kingdom, only interested in its own safety. Now, with Artemia as its ruler, everything is about to change.

itemIntroductions.weapon: This sacred treasure of Penteonia is said to have been sent from the Heavens to eradicate the Demons. This Light Staff, known to respond only to those worthy of sainthood, radiated with splendid light in the hands of the young Artemia, as if to honor the future empress. It calls upon the power of absolute light, unleashing heaven's vengeance upon its enemies while protecting its wielder with divine light.
itemIntroductions.soul:
Whenever Artemia used her magic, she felt that she is indeed, the chosen.

During her yound days, Artemia did not consider her staff special. However, as she witnessed how her staff drew the magic of light as if it was guiding the light, and how the power from the staff embraced her warmly, she started to accept the staff as not just a simple weapon, but as her most reliable compannion.
'As long as i have you in my hands, I am the most incandescent light that brilliantly lights the world.'
Just as she promised, Artemia felt the most reliable light from behind her.

And just like her, Brauxio think of Artemia earnestly.
treasures: A brooch crafted by the best blacksmith of Penteonia Kingdom in honor of the beautiful Queen. People call it Queen's Dignity. Made with smithing skills that the blacksmith learned from dwarves, the jewel on it has a mystical power. It can concentrate Artemia's energy of light and release it all at once.

Earrings made from light kveril, a rare mineral that is said to only come out in Penteonia. When Artemia was crowned Empress, she received it along with the crown. It doesn't lose its light even at night, and it actually shines even more brightly in the dark. It's known as the jewel of principles and brilliance amongst the people. An item that raises the dignity of the queen as they shine from her ears.

A crown that is passed down to the king of Penteonia. A part of it had been broken by a previous tyrant, but it's been repaired. A new red gem called the Soul of the Sun has been embedded at the center of the crown. Its dignified form compels one to kneel before it in a show of respect.

A mystical mirror that contains the spells of royal elder wizards, passed down to generations in the royal family of Penteonia. It is known that the first king made it himself for the eternal prosperity of Penteonia. Only the leader of the country could look into it, and the one standing in front of the mirror receives the blessing of light. This would then lead the kings to be the light themselves to all his people in the country.
